snippet.title: Zooma VR - Trailer [VR, Vive, Rift, WMR, Index]
snippet.description:
Trailer for Zooma VR, a fun virtual reality match-three puzzle game where you need to make combos and collect bonuses to finish the levels in time. Developed by Gizmo VR, available for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Windows Mixed Reality and Valve Index. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/zooma-vr

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1

► Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com
